snippet.title: "There's Always a Madman: Do Your Worst" Launch Trailer - It Vexes Me
snippet.description:
The spy thriller interactive novel "There's Always a Madman: Do Your Worst" launches November 8, 2024 on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2960890/Theres_Always_a_Madman_Do_Your_Worst

Do you have what it takes to prevent a silver-obsessed madman from destroying the Golden Gate Bridge?
